Blockchain

09/10/2021

Solididty Practice

My dive into Blockchain and Solidity is aided by freeCodeCamp.com's 16 hour tutorial on Youtube. The start of the tutorial answered the questions of "What is a blockchain?" and "How are blockchains used?" There was also some discussion on the history of Blockchain technology, and where it is going in the future

After the introduction, I created a Eth text account using Metamax. Metamax provides users with a free software wallet for all Eth based currency, and gives users test accounts to practice trading crypto.

After creating the test Metamax account, I dove into Solidity using remix.ethereum.org.Remix provides users with a Solidity text editor and UI for creating contracts for blockchain. Solidity

The function in views.py returns an HttpResponse that takes the content type of "text/csv." Because every column in my database is not really necessary to export (like contributor id, or upload date), the function writes rows based on the selected columns, skipping over the ones not selected. Check out the full code on GitHub.

) } export default SolidityPractice
